00035 graph::graph(Symbol const &name, ext_iterator const &conf, TICK init) 
00036   :m_name(name), m_currentTick(init) {
00037       size_t number = add_reactors(conf);
00038       syslog()<<"Created "<<number<<" reactors.";
00039 }

00041 graph::~graph() {
00042   clear();

00045 TREX::utils::internals::LogEntry graph::syslog(std::string const &context) const {
00046   std::ostringstream oss;
00047   oss<<m_currentTick<<"]["<<m_name.str();
00048   if( !context.empty() )
00049     oss<<"."<<context;
00050 
00051   return m_log->syslog(oss.str());
00052 }
00053 
00054 void graph::clear() {
00055   while( !m_reactors.empty() ) {
00056     syslog()<<"Disconnecting \""<<m_reactors.front()->getName()<<"\" from the graph.";
00057     m_reactors.front()->isolate();
00058     m_reactors.pop_front();
00059   } 
00060 }
00061 
00062 long graph::index(graph::reactor_id id) const {
00063 #ifndef DEBUG
00064   size_t pos = 0;
00065   // not efficient at all !!!
00066   details::reactor_set::const_iterator i;
00067   for(i=m_reactors.begin();
00068       m_reactors.end()!=i && i->get()!=id; ++i, ++pos);
00069   return pos;
00070 #else
00071   return reinterpret_cast<long>(id);
00072 #endif
00073 }
00074 
00075 size_t graph::add_reactors(ext_iterator iter) {
00076   graph *me = this;
00077   xml_factory::iter_type it = xml_factory::iter_traits::build(iter, me);
00078   boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> reactor;
00079   size_t count = 0;
00080   
00081   while( m_factory->iter_produce(it, reactor) ) {
00082     std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool> 
00083       ret = m_reactors.insert(reactor);
00084     if( ret.second ) 
00085       syslog()<<"Reactor \""<<reactor->getName()<<"\" created.";
00086     else {
00087       throw MultipleReactors(*this, **(ret.first));
00088     }                   
00089     ++count;
00090   }
00091   return count;
00092 }
00093 
00094 graph::reactor_id graph::add_reactor(rapidxml::xml_node<> &description) {
00095   graph *me = this;
00096   TeleoReactor::xml_arg_type 
00097     arg = xml_factory::arg_traits::build(description, me);
00098   boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> tmp(m_factory->produce(arg));
00099   std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool> ret = m_reactors.insert(tmp);
00100 
00101   if( ret.second ) 
00102     syslog()<<"Reactor \""<<tmp->getName()<<"\" created.";
00103   else {
00104     throw MultipleReactors(*this, **(ret.first));
00105   }                     
00106   return ret.first->get();
00107 }
00108 
00109 graph::reactor_id graph::add_reactor(graph::reactor_id r) {
00110   boost::shared_ptr<TeleoReactor> tmp(r);  
00111   std::pair<details::reactor_set::iterator, bool> ret = m_reactors.insert(tmp);
00112   // As it is an internal call make is silent for now ...
00113   return ret.first->get();
00114 }
00115 
00116 bool graph::kill_reactor(graph::reactor_id r) {
00117   if( null_reactor()!=r ) {
00118     details::reactor_set::iterator pos = m_reactors.find(r->getName());
00119     
00120     if( pos->get()==r ) {
00121       // clean up relations
00122       syslog()<<"Destroying reactor \""<<r->getName()<<"\".";
00123       m_reactors.erase(pos);
00124       return true;
00125     }
00126   }
00127   return false;
00128 }
00129 
00130 graph::reactor_id graph::isolate(graph::reactor_id r) const {
00131   if( null_reactor()!=r ) {
00132     details::reactor_set::const_iterator pos = m_reactors.find(r->getName());
00133     if( pos->get()==r ) {
00134       syslog()<<"Putting reactor\""<<r->getName()<<"\" in quarantine.";
00135       r->isolate();
00136       return r;
00137     }
00138   }
00139   return null_reactor();
00140 }

00142 details::timeline_set::iterator graph::get_timeline(Symbol const &tl) {
00143   details::timeline *cand = new details::timeline(m_currentTick, tl);
00144   std::pair<details::timeline_set::iterator, bool>
00145     ret = m_timelines.insert(cand);
00146   if( ret.second ) 
00147     syslog()<<"Timeline \""<<tl.str()<<"\" created.";
00148   else
00149     delete cand;
00150   return ret.first;
00151 }
00152 
00153 graph::size_type graph::count_relations() const {
00154   size_t res = 0;
00155   for(details::timeline_set::const_iterator i=m_timelines.begin();
00156       m_timelines.end()!=i; ++i )
00157     res += (*i)->size();
00158   return res;
00159 }

00161 
00162 bool graph::assign(graph::reactor_id r, Symbol const &timeline) {
00163   details::timeline_set::iterator tl = get_timeline(timeline);
00164   return (*tl)->assign(*r);
00165 }
00166 
00167 bool graph::subscribe(reactor_id r, Symbol const &timeline, bool control) {
00168   details::timeline_set::iterator tl = get_timeline(timeline);
00169   return (*tl)->subscribe(*r, control);
00170 }
